CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 8, 1964, pg. 1, reads: "Family Of Nations Talk - Shown above with Joseph Clemons, music teacher, is the other half of the United Nations Recitation Group at the Miller Elementary School. The project had an enthusiastic reception. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of boys and girls of the sixth grade United Nations Recitation Group, posed with music teacher Joseph Clemons on stage at Miller Elementary School
